Name: Shape Puzzle
About the game: Combine, rotate and move different shapes to solve puzzles. There are 80 different puzzles available at the time of release. With increasing difficulty for several hours of puzzling fun. Get to know all field types and face the most complicated puzzles. I planned several Updates with new puzzles, within the months after release. Also I am working on a puzzle generator that will provide you with unlimited puzzles.
